name: The Dark Dog
description:
Here's a bit about how to play the game, if the intro wasn't clear enough (it probably wasn't): Press buttons at the right time to perform and block attacks. You press the attack button to initiate a sequence where you press either the 'z' or 'x' key to deal damage. The one with the sword, a.k.a swordog, uses 'z', and the magician, a.k.a, magidog, uses 'x'. You use these keys to block attacks from the enemy when they are attacking.

This game was inspired by the Mario and Luigi series. (Specifically Superstar Saga, as that is the one I played) 

I was going to have act commands like in Deltarune and Undertale, but I got bored with the project, so I scrapped that idea so I could finish this up quickly.

Anyway, art/animation done in procreate, music in Garage Band, sfx in Bosca Ceoli, and the game engine used was Godot.
